articles.title: Metformin induces AMPK activation and inhibits mTOR signaling in breast cancer cells
articles.abstract: Preclinical studies demonstrate that metformin activates AMP-activated protein kinase (AMPK), leading to downstream inhibition of mTOR and reduced proliferation in breast cancer cell lines. Synergy with chemotherapy observed in vitro.

articles.title: Population analysis of metformin use and reduced cancer incidence
articles.abstract: Epidemiological studies show an association between metformin use and lower incidence of several cancers, though confounding by indication and metabolic health remains a concern.

articles.title: Metabolic reprogramming by metformin in colorectal adenomas
articles.abstract: Clinical biomarker studies show metformin reduces insulin and IGF-1 pathway activity and may decrease adenoma recurrence in hyperinsulinemic patients.
